segments.text: Could I see the manager please ? I have a complaint to make .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I ’ m the manager here . What can I do for you , Madam ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you have the room checked before we move in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 1808 . The toilet doesn ’ t work properly . The water doesn ’ t run in the shower .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m awfully sorry to hear that . ( After checking ) I ’ ll turn to it right away . I do apologize . We ’ ll change your room to 2002 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s not bad . Thanks for your help .
segments.speaker: S1
